Articles.Content: i'm in the editor in 1.11, and the editor switcher is gone. and i have no idea how to increase the window size. so i guess i got that goin for me

The switch editor button should be just to the left of the craft name (assuming no bugs, or some silliness with an undersized window).

The window size under the graphics part of settings from the main menu. (right side, under the Video title). Alternatively, you can edit the SCREEN_RESOLUTION_WIDTH and SCREEN_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT lines in settings.cfg
